author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police have arrested three persons and recovered from them 100 kg of copper wire stolen from windmills in the southern parts of the district.

Following repeated complaints of theft of copper wire from wind turbine generators, the police formed a special team to nab the culprits. When the police nabbed Indhukumar (35) of Nakkaneri, James (37) of Gandhi Nagar near Koodankulam and Senthilkumar of Parameshwarapuram on suspicion, the trio confessed to the crime. Based on information provided by them, the police recovered 100 kg of copper wire. Further investigations are on.
title: 100 kg stolen copper wire recovered
